Description: Epiphone Sheraton II PRO Ebony Finish With Gold Hardware Semi-Hollowbody Black Electric Guitar This guitar is in great condition. There is some minor cosmetic signs of use like some wear on the hardware, minor scratches, etc. Everything is fully functional and playable. We just restrung and did a basic set up on this guitar however we didn't need to do much besides make a very small tweak on the truss rod. The action on this guitar is awesome and it plays great all the way down. The current strings it has on it are the D'addario EXL110 10-46 electric guitar strings. Please view all provided photos for further reference on the conditon of this item. Factory description and specs are listed below. Featuring ProBucker™ pickups w/coil-splitting, Graphtech® NuBone XL™ nut plus new color finish! The Epiphone Sheraton™-II PRO honors Epiphone's most influential "thin-line" semi-hollowbody electric archtop, now offered in a beautiful new Midnight Sapphire finish plus critically acclaimed ProBucker™ pickups with coil-splitting and a Graphtech® NuBone XL™ nut. PRODUCT FEATURES Epiphone Sheraton-II™ PRO At A Glance Critically acclaimed ProBuckerTM Humbuckers with coil-splitting Traditional Mother of Pearl and Abalone Inlay Graphtech® NuBone XL and Grover® Rotomatics™ New Midnight Sapphire finish plus Ebony, Vintage Sunburst, and Wine Red SPECIFICATIONS Body MaterialLaminated Maple Top MaterialLaminated Maple Neck Material5-pc Hard Maple/Walnut Laminated Neck Shape1960's SlimTaper™ Neck JointGlued-In, Set Neck Scale Length24.75" Fingerboard MaterialPau Ferro with "block and triangle" inlays w/Mother of Pearl and Abalone Fingerboard Radius12" Frets22; Medium/Jumbo BindingTop: 5-ply (Ivory/Black), Back - 1-ply (Ivory), Neck - 5-ply (Ivory/Black), Headstock - 5-ply (Ivory/Black), "F" Holes - 1-ply (Ivory/Black) HeadstockVintage "Large Clipped Ear" with Mother of Pearl "Vine" Inlay NutGraphtech® NuBone XL Nut Width1-11/16" HardwareGold Machine HeadsGrover® Rotomatics™; 18:1 ratio Neck PickupProBucker-2™ Bridge PickupProBucker-3™ ControlsBridge Volume with coil-splitting, Neck Volume with coil-splitting, Bridge Tone, Neck Tone, 3-way pickup selector (toggle); Ivory toggle cap BridgeEpiphone LockTone™ Tune-o-matic TailpieceEpiphone LockTone™ Stop Bar PickguardBound "Tortoise" Pickguard with metal "E" Truss Rod Cover2-ply; (Black/White); Vintage "E" in White KnobsTop Hats with metal inserts (Volume/Tone) StringsD'Addario® 10-46 gauge Immediate payment is required.
